\index{gai\_errc@{gai\_errc}!error.h@{error.h}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{gai\_errc}{gai\_errc}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{error_8h_a00635fd3ecbfd32231026cdcba0c81ff} 
enum class \mbox{\hyperlink{error_8h_a00635fd3ecbfd32231026cdcba0c81ff}{sockpp\+::gai\+\_\+errc}}\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [strong]}}



Errors returned from the getaddressinfo() function. 

These are the possible errors returned from {\ttfamily getaddressinfo()} placed in a class enumeration to give them a string, specific type.

Note that this is not used in Windows since it returns errors that are managed by its Get\+Last\+Error.
